testsuite.name: Dashboard-SDK-End to End Test Cases
testsuite.details: Dashboard SDK End to End Test Cases

testcase.name: Create a Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: Login to Dashboard with valid credentials

step.actions: 1. Login to the Dashboard, click on "Add New Application"
step.expectedresults: User should be on Create Application page

step.actions:
Enter the required below information to create a Publisher Application of different Platforms

  • Select the Platform
  • Enter the name of the Application
  • Check the "my app is live on the app store" check box
  • Enter the URL
  • Enter the other information
step.expectedresults: Information entered should be displayed in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: IOS/Android/Amazon Publisher Applications should be created with Default Placements and user should be on the Application details page

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and search the Publisher Application created in DB-SDK-E2E-1from Global search by entering the name of the App or Vungle Application ID
step.expectedresults: Pub App should be available

step.actions: Click details icon
step.expectedresults: User should land on Pub App details page with "Add new Placement" link on the right side

step.actions: Click on "Add New Placement"
step.expectedresults: User should be on the cReate Palcement page

step.actions:
Enter the required information

  • Name
  • Target CPM Floor

click Submit
step.expectedresults: Placement should be cretaed with unique reference Id and user should should be on the Placement Grid.

testcase.name: Create an Advertiser Applictraion
testcase.preconditions: Login to Dashboard with valid credentials

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and toggle to Advertiser option by clicking the Hamburger icon
Click on Applications tab
step.expectedresults: User should be on the All existing Advertiser Apps should be displayed and "Add New Application"button should be available

step.actions: Click on "Add New Application" link
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Application Page

step.actions:
Enter the following information

  • Select the Platform
  • Enter the Application Name
  • Check the "My app is live on the appstore" check boc
  • Enter the URL
  • Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Advertiser Application should be created and user should be on the Adv App details page

testcase.name: Whitelist the Apps
testcase.preconditions: Both Publisher and Advertiser Apps should be available

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and search the Publisher Application created in the DB-SDK-E2E-1 test case, by entering the name od App ID in the Global search.
step.expectedresults: Publisher Application should be available

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update application page of the Publisher Application.

step.actions:
In the App targeting field of the targeting section of the Publisher Page,

  • Search the Advertiser App created in test case DB-SDK-E2E-3  and select
  • Click Whitelist radio button
  • Submit
step.expectedresults:
• User should be able to search and select the Adv App and whitelist it.
  • App should be saved and user should be on the details page of the Pub App

step.actions: Now navigate to Global search and search the Advertiser created  in the test case DB-SDK-E2E-3
step.expectedresults: App should be available

step.actions: Click Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update Application page

step.actions:
In the App targeting field of the targeting section of the Advertiser Page,

  • Search the PublisherApp created in test case DB-SDK-E2E-1  and select
  • Click Whitelist radio button
  • Submit
step.expectedresults:
• User should be able to search and select the Pub App and whitelist it.
  • App should be saved and user should be on the details page of the Adv App

step.actions: Verify Apps are whitelisted
step.expectedresults: Whitelisted Apps should be displayed in targeting section with hyperlink to the App in details page of both Advertiser and Publisher Page

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and toggle to Advertiser option  by clicking on hamburger
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Advertiser side with Campaigns, Application and Creatives Tabs.

step.actions: Click on Details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Advertiser App

step.actions: Click on "Add New Campaign" button
step.expectedresults: Confirmation for the manual Campaign should pop up and upon selection of Manual Campaign,User should be directed to the Create Camapign page

step.actions:
On the Create Campaign page, enter the following info

  • Enter the Campaign Name
  • Search and select the Advertiser Application created in DB-SDK-E2E3 in the Application field
  • Select the type of Campaign
  • Enter Start and End Time
  • Enter the Total Budget
  • Select the countries for country targeting
  • Enter the Advertiser Application nam ein the App targeting field
  • Enter TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults: Information entered should populate in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be created and user should land on Campaign details page

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and pull the Campaign created in test case DB-SDK-E2E-7
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available an duser should be on the Campaign details page

step.actions: Click on "Add New Creative"link on the right and on selection window , Select the type of creative you want to create, say Dynamic Creative
step.expectedresults: Dynamic Template Creative should be selected and user should be on the Create Creative Page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on Create Creative Page

  • Creative Name
  • Select the Dynamic Template, say Gradient
  • Video Setup
    1. Choose Add New Video radio button
    2. Video Name
    3. Local Drive - Search for a Video you downloaded earlier
    4. Click Upload video and wait for the video to encode
step.expectedresults: Information entered should be displayed in appropriate fields

step.actions:
In the Product Description section, enter the following

  • App Name
  • Company
  • Upload App Icon
  • Enter the CTA URL
  • Upload the Landscape Image
  • UPload the Portrait Image
  • Enter the TPAT and URL
step.expectedresults: Information entered should be saved

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Gradient Dynamic Template creative should be cretaed and user should be onthe details page with the ability to preview the video uploaded.

step.actions: On the Amazon Fire device, set up the configurations by entering the laptop IP address and port no in the settings
step.expectedresults: IP Address and port no should be updated

step.actions: Makesure Laptop and Amazon device both are on the same Wifi.
step.expectedresults: Bothe the devies should be on the same Wifi

step.actions: Navigate to chls.pro to download the certificate
step.expectedresults: Certificate should be downloaded

step.actions: Clear the cache/existing data on the Amazon device by going Applications/Application manager
step.expectedresults: Existing data should be removed

step.actions:
On IOS?Android/Amazon Device, 

  • Install the App on amazon device and set charles Proxy.
  • Enter the Application ID
  • Enter the Placement ID's
  • Initialize the SDK.
  • Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
• App should get initialized.
  • Config API should get called.
  • SDK should download an Ad for the placement id when auto cache flag is enabled.

step.actions: Click Play
step.expectedresults: IOS/Android/ Amazon  placement ID should serve the Ad and Ad should play normally on TestApp with respect to the  placement id.
